title: Citi Presents the Winner of the One Million Multipremios Miles Promotion in Nicaragua
summary: Managua, Nicaragua - Once again, Citi Nicaragua held its popular One Million Multipremios Miles drawing for miles accumulated in the One Million Savings Account. The goal of this program is to continue fostering a culture of savings among Nicaraguan families. Citi encourages its existing customers to increase their account balance to improve their chances of participating in the quarterly drawing. The third drawing of the year took place September 6, and the lucky winner was Jose Alejandro Alvarado Talavera, who has been Citi's client in the Ciudad Jardin branch since April 2009.
tag-1: Citi Presents the Winner of the One Million Multipremios Miles Promotion in Nicaragua
tag-2: Managua, Nicaragua – Once again, Citi Nicaragua held its popular One Million Multipremios Miles drawing for miles accumulated in the One Million Savings Account. The goal of this program is to continue fostering a culture of savings among Nicaraguan families. Citi encourages its existing customers to increase their account balance to improve their chances of participating in the quarterly drawing. The third drawing of the year took place September 6, and the lucky winner was Jose Alejandro Alvarado Talavera, who has been Citi's client in the Ciudad Jardin branch since April 2009.
tag-3: "This award reaffirms Citi's commitment to responsible finance, because encouraging a culture of savings is critical to the development of Nicaragua and the people of Nicaragua," said Nahim Hannon, Citi Nicaragua Passive Products head.
tag-4: The One Million Savings Account is the only account in Nicaragua that carries an ongoing benefit to its savers by recognizing their efforts and loyalty every day, as they accumulate Multipremios Miles every month in their One Million Savings Account. Customers can also accumulate miles for every purchase made with their debit card.
tag-5: The next drawing will take place January 6, 2012, and people are invited to open a One Million Savings Account to enjoy these great benefits.
tag-6: Customers can later use their Multipremios Miles in many ways; they can be redeemed for: products in more than 200 nationwide affiliate stores, items at Citi agencies, cash and airline tickets, and they can also be used to pay utility bills through Citiphone 2255-8000.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
